com.spotify.apollo

Interface Request


  • public interface Request
    Defines the data Apollo presents for an incoming request. Request instances are immutable. However, requests can be built using forUri(String, String) methods, and headers and payload can be added using withHeader(String, String) and withPayload(ByteString).

    • Method Summary

      Creates a new Request based on this, but with no header information.

      Creates a Request for the given uri.

      Creates a Request for the given uri and method.

      A header of the request message, or empty if no header with that name is found.
      Map<String,String> headers()
      The headers of the request message.

      The method of the request message.

    • Method Detail

      • method

        String method()
        The method of the request message.

      • uri

        String uri()
        The uri of the request message. Uri query parameters are available via parameter(String) and parameters(). Uri pathArgs are available in RequestContext.

      • parameters

        Map<String,List<String>> parameters()
        The uri query parameters of the request message.

      • parameter

        default Optional<String> parameter(String parameter)
        A uri query parameter of the request message, or empty if no parameter with that name is found. Returns the first query parameter value if it is repeated. Use parameters() to get all repeated values.

      • headers

        Map<String,String> headers()
        The headers of the request message.

      • header

        default Optional<String> header(String name)
        A header of the request message, or empty if no header with that name is found.

      • service

        Optional<String> service()
        The calling service of the request, if known.

      • payload

        Optional<okio.ByteString> payload()
        The request message payload, or empty if there is no payload.

      • ttl

        default Optional<Duration> ttl()
        The request ttl.

      • withUri

        Request withUri(String uri)
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with a different URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - the new uri

      • withService

        Request withService(String service)
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with a different calling service.
        Parameters:
        service - the new service

      • withHeader

        Request withHeader(String name,
                   String value)
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with an additional header.
        Parameters:
        name - Header name to add
        value - Header value
        Returns:
        A request with the added header

      • withHeaders

        Request withHeaders(Map<String,String> additionalHeaders)
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with additional headers. If the current request has a header whose key is also included in the additionalHeaders map, then the new request will have the header value defined in the map.
        Parameters:
        additionalHeaders - map of headers to add
        Returns:
        A request with the added headers

      • clearHeaders

        Request clearHeaders()
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with no header information.
        Returns:
        A request without headers

      • withPayload

        Request withPayload(okio.ByteString payload)
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with a different payload.
        Parameters:
        payload - the new payload

      • withTtl

        default Request withTtl(Duration ttl)
        Creates a new Request based on this, but with a different ttl.
        Parameters:
        ttl - The duration

      • forUri

        static Request forUri(String uri,
                      String method)
        Creates a Request for the given uri and method.
        Parameters:
        uri - The requested uri
        method - The request method
        Returns:
        A request with for the given uri and method.

      • forUri

        static Request forUri(String uri)
        Creates a Request for the given uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - The requested uri
        Returns:
        A request with for the given uri.
